divs: Sighting Detailsi was siting on my back porch on the phone and we have a subdivision behind us i was already looking back there while i was talking and the house about 80 feet away like 20 feet above the roof i saw a bright light i first i thought plane but no noise and it was fast if it was something man made i figured i would hear it there was no sound at all oddly i was not weird ed out like it was a every day thing dont know it that is important but that how i felt but any way it just zoomed by flashing a very bright light just around the object like it was a ball of white flame like a very bright glow then like it realized i was looking at it it stopped flashing went dark and flew straight up like automatically i saw a shimmer of what i thought was metal and went straight up well thats that
